page.title: 08A DAY IN SCHOOL AT WHADDON
page.content: I ARRIVE AT SCHOOL AT{8.45 a.m.}AND PLAY WITH MY FRIENDS IN THE PLAYGROUND UNTIL{8.55 a.m.} AFTER THE BELL RINGS, WE ALL GO INTO CLASS WHILE OUR TEACHER CALLS THE REGISTER. THEN THE WHOLE SCHOOL GOES INTO THE HALL FOR {ASSEMBLY.}DURING THE MORNING WE WORK ON DIFFERENT SUBJECTS LIKE ENGLISH, MATHEMATICS AND P.E. AND DURING PLAYTIME I DRINK MY MILK BEFORE PLAYING OUTSIDE.{AT LUNCHTIME}SOME CHILDREN GO HOME TO EAT THEIR DINNER BUT I HAVE MINE IN THE SCHOOL CANTEEN. SOME CHILDREN BRING SANDWICHES.{IN THE AFTERNOON,}WE LEARN SUBJECTS LIKE HISTORY, GEOGRAPHY AND SCIENCE AS WELL AS ART AND CRAFT AND SPORTS AND GAMES. SCHOOL FINISHES AT {3.20p.m.}BUT SOME EVENINGS I STAY BEHIND TO JOIN IN DIFFERENT CLUB ACTIVITIES.
